name: TheLivingTao
0:
”Alexa open the living tao”
”Alexa use the living tao”
”Alexa launch the living tao”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the living tao
des: The Living Tao provides a living, up to date view of the Tao. Select a random verse each day, and hear commentary that's updated on a monthly basis. The best way to bring the Tao to your daily life, and Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
